title: Mikhail Aleksandrov
text:
Mikhail Alekseyevich Aleksandrov (; born 26 August 1963) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> coach and a former player.
Playing career.
As a player, he made his debut in the <a href="Soviet%20Second%20League">Soviet Second League</a> in 1981 for <a href="FC%20Tekstilshchik%20Ivanovo">FC Tekstilshchik Ivanovo</a>.
